articles.title: Climate Summit Agrees on Global Carbon Tax
articles.description: World leaders reached a landmark agreement to implement a global carbon tax by 2030 to combat climate change.

articles.title: Former Indian MP Sentenced to Life in Prison for Raping His Domestic Worker
articles.description: Prajwal Revanna, a former Indian MP and grandson of a former prime minister, was sentenced to life imprisonment for the rape of his domestic worker.

articles.title: SpaceX Launches First Mars Colony Module
articles.description: SpaceX successfully deployed the first module of a planned permanent Mars colony, marking a significant step in space exploration.
